reviews.review: Todos los HL son recomendables, y el HL2-Episodio 2 no podia ser menos. Tiene la combinación perfecta de puzzles  y de acción. Tanto unos como otros no son difíciles, pero si no sabes como avanzar (como me pasó a mí en un par de ocasiones, una en un puzzle y otra en EL tramo final de acción), "don't worry", las ayudas de Steam y/o google estan para explicarte que aquello que parece imposible no lo es, siempre y cuando lo hagas de otra manera. :)

Гра просто мега, шкода що почав грати в останю частину гри, знаю не всі ньюанси сюжету, проте гра мене заполонила. Я раніше цурався Халви, думав ще одна тупа постаполіксна гра, з тупим сюжет, і знаєте...я радий що я помилявся. Грати Г.Фріменом дуже цікаво, цікаві вороги... і саме головне цікаві персонажі і постійно інтригуючий сюжет. Гра одним словом*часів і народів*. Раджу всім хто не грав, ви не пошкодуєте.

While the first episode was exciting merely for the continuation of the adventure of Freeman and company post-HL2, the second episode is less about Valve prooving themselves and more about creating an new experience as memorable as the main game itself. Episode Two is less about babysitting Alyx and instead focuses on expansive outdoor areas. The final vehicle-based battle is the highlight of the plot, due to its epic nature. As improperly and frequently as the word is used, "epic" is the right word to use to describe Episode Two, moreso than the first. That being said, both chapters make for a perfect extension of the plot of Half-Life 2 and are more or less just as satisfying.

Half Life 2: Episode Two, zacina tam, kde skoncila Episode One. po prebudeni sa v rozbitom vlaku a najdeni gravity gunu, sa dobrodruzstvo moze zacat. toto bola prva hra od Valve, kde spustili Achievementy a tak niest zahradneho trpaslika pocas celeho pribehu, alebo sa na aute pretekat s Dogom, je potrebne na ich ziskanie. hra je na konci dost obtiazna a ukoncenie Episody vas nabudi na dalsie pokracovanie.

100% : 2010-09-03

Sorprendente trabajo en el guion y la historia. La banda sonora es especial para los ambientes de combate. La idea de explorar un ambiente abierto y al aire libre atrae bastante tus ganas de jugar. La intervencion de G-Man es bastante consisa y nos habla sobre Alyx cosa que nunca se espero de la historia. La idea de manerar en un bosque tan bello como "White Forest" fue destacable y sorprendente. Los graficos mejoran mucho mas que en el anterior episodio y la presentacion del Dr. Magnusson en la linea del juego fue una brillante idea. 
Yo recomiendo el juego a ojos cerrados y sin pensarlo 2 veces.
Pero Gabe Newell tiene que liberar el 3° y posiblemnete ultimo episodio, la espera ya ha superado mucho tiempo y necesitamos saber que paso despues de ese trajico final en el episodio 2.

It`s a fun game, to be honest this has to be my fav one out of de Series.

Даже спустя 6 лет(!) после выхода, продолжает оставаться настоящим некст-геном. Имхо, до сих пор ничего лучше, красивее, интереснее в жанре экшена так и не появилось. И не появится до самого Episode Three.

Simply put: All you expect of an add-on in your wildest dreams!

Graphics are again better than in Ep1, mostly new and exciting environment. Enjoyable new gadget, characters and creatures. Finally the Bull Squid from HL1 is back in a much better design a.k.a. Acid Antlion. 

It is diverse, got lots of challenges and is by all means the toughest amongst the HL franchise; especially at the end. 
All what the first Episode lacked, they made up for and I am not only talking about the length. Truly worth of the series and a must buy for any HL enthusiast.

So, who here REALLY loves the ending? When I first played through this, I SURE DIDN'T. I was extremely distraught, and I felt I was entitled to a sequel. It's like with Fallout 4; they will keep torturing us. Teasing us. The endings we have recieved to these awesome games are EXTREME cliffhangers, and I think the man's gonna fall soon if nothing happens. I love this series, but I can't stand that (no spoilers!) it is ending THIS way. It CAN'T end this way for much longer, or I will lose faith in the series.. Trust me, if you play through the entire series you'll love it, but you WON'T appreciate this ending. Otherwise, it's wonderful...
Juego muy vicioso, batalla final extremadamente complicada. Historia maestra

A well done pause to Half Life 2.

Why call it a pause, not an end you ask? That is for you find out, but it's done in the same way Portal 1 was.

If you haven't played HL2:EP2 by the time HL3 or HL2:EP3 comes out, you should. Half Life 2, while not much of a "heart pounding" action game, is about the puzzles and events. Sure story is there, but a lot of people who play through HL2 don't notice it. It's not critical, nor really engaging on any level.

So all in all, should play this, but don't expect your socks being blown off. It's more like of those games you play and put in your library to collect dust. I revist the whole HL series from time to time, but that's not common for others.

Episode 2 definately brings back the impact half life 2 originally had, lots of neat puzzles, intense fights, great AI and important progress in the wonderful story that is Half life. HALF-LIFE 2 EPISODE 2 starts immediately where Half-Life 2 Episode 1 ended. Gordon Freeman and Alyx Vance must continue their fight, alongside the resistance, against the evil Combine. After the ever so slightly below par Episode 1, Episode 2 is a real return to form. Everything that was so good about HL2 is developed here and made even better. The narrative arc is strong, the dialogue well-written and witty, the voice acting accomplished and convincing, the environments spectacular and varied, and the mix between puzzle solving and combat just right. We meet several new enemies and some of the combat is pretty challenging, especially the final battle which is big on scale and mayhem and requires real strategy to complete. It’s a tough finale but well worth the effort. There’s so much to enjoy in the whole Half-Life series I can’t recommend these games enough.

5/5

A game worth playing. It is strongly recommended that you play Half-Life 2 and Half-Life 2 Episode One. The story continues at the cliffhanger you were left with in Episode One. The game definately changes the order of events in a usual story, and it produces one heck of a story. The end is something you have to experience yourself, and it is why many a fan of Half-Life is waiting to see the next title in the Half-Life series be released. You can't go wrong with the price. Don't forget about the items added to Garry's Mod too!

Игра, которую я на самом деле не ждал, после выхода HL2. Причем, я в нее поиграл значительно раньше, чем HL2:Ep1. Мне очень понравилось, что над движком и графикой в игре немного так поработали, добавили новых врагов, а действия перенесли в шахты и леса. Здорово было полюбоваться над зловещей ворнкой (а как ее еще назвать после выхода фильма "ночной дозор"?) над Сити-17.

Но вот через несколько лет переигрывать что-то уже не слишком хочется. Да, я перепрошел полностью вторую часть ради ачивок и карточек, вспомнил что там было в Ep1, благо она короткая. Но второй эпизод (зная что третьего нет и не предвидится) не смог осилить до конца. И не смотрите, что стим пишет, якобы я играл в нее 240 часов. Это какой-то глюк, там и 240 минут быть не должно.

Half Life 2 is a first person shooter game released in 2004. It was awarded as the Game of the Decade in the VGA Awards. The award was received by Gabe Newell, Valve founder.

The game takes place 20 years after the Black Mesa incident of Half Life ( The game that chaged it all ) . Gordon Freeman awakes from hibernation in City 17 and become part of the resistance to face the Combine Empire and attempt to defeat it. In the game Gordon meets Alyx Vance,  who is part of the resistance. The game is one of the pioneers in introducing a playmate .

Half Life 2 presents different enemies . The Headcrabs still produce that feeling of rejection when they attack. The action is breathtaking but it breaks , not like Call of Duty games where you shoot without breathing.

The narrative is implemented throughout the game, not with recording or notes , it is not necessary. The experience is brilliant. The Source engine allows good management of physics and the introduction of a new weapon. The gravity gun . The technology also allows open spaces in addition to traditional outdoor passageways and internal spaces .

The handling of the narrative and physics puzzles changed the way the FPS games developed from there into the future . It was a turning point in games history the same way it was the first Half Life .

The game was released for PC under Windows , required a 2 Ghz processor . 512 MB ​​of RAM , and a graphics card compatible with Direct X 8.1 . For the few resources sought at that time the graphical quality of the game was very good and ran very smoothly .

This is one of the "must play" games if one is serious about being a Gamer ,not only for its quality but also for being part of the history of video games.

Episode 2 schließt direkt an die Story von Half Life 2 und Half Life 2: Episode 1 an. Man wird sofort in ein abwechslungsreiches Spielgeschehen geworfen und merkt allein schon an den ersten Minuten, wie gut dieses Spiel ist! Und das Spielerlebnis bleibt das ganze Spiel über:
Die meiste Zeit verbringt man in einer wundervoll gestalteten und detailreichen Landschaft in den Wäldern um White Forest, einer alten Raketenabschussbasis, in denen man öfters auch einen kleinen Buggy zur Verfügung hat. Die Atmosphäre ist packend, der Soundtrack grandios, die Grafik der Source-Engine ist selbst für die heutige Zeit noch sehr gelungen und die Physik Engine erhöht durch die kleinen Physikspielchen auch noch einmal den Spielspaß des Spiels.
Außerdem kommen einem die Charaktere wirklich lebhaft vor, sind gut animiert und man fühlt sich, als wäre man selbst der Held des Spiels: der berühmte Gordon Freeman.
Mir hat Episode 2 das beste Spielerlebnis gebracht, dass ich je hatte! Die Fortsetzung übertrifft meiner Meinung nach sogar das Hauptspiel Half Life 2, das auf jeden Fall zu einem der besten Spiele überhaupt zählt.
Für mich steht ganz klar fest, dass ich dieses Meisterwerk noch einige Male durchspielen werde!

Half-Life® 2: Episode Two — вторая часть из трилогии новинок от Valve, которая продолжает события знаменитой серии Half-Life®.

Вас в шкуре кандидата наук Гордона Фримена в последний раз видели покидающим Сити-17 вместе с Аликс Вэнс в тот самый момент, когда Цитадель взлетела на воздух от взрыва неведомой силы. Во втором эпизоде вам предстоит пробиться сквозь силы Альянса до Белой Рощи, чтобы доставить пакет с критически важной информацией, украденный в Цитадели, на базу Сопротивления — в руки ученых.

Второй эпизод продолжает классический игровой процесс Half-Life, добавив в него уникальные виды оружия, средства передвижения и новые разновидности монстров.
